div.h2: Together, bridging the skills gap in health and social development for the future
div.p: At the HWSETA, people matter and are at the heart of service delivery. We strive to make a difference to people’s lives by contributing to skills development throughout South Africa in the sectors and communities that we serve.

In all that we do, we are guided by our common goal – to bridge the skills gap and make HWSETA a great SETA that delivers services and training to our stakeholders ; a Seta that has a positive impact on our people . Our shared values of integrity, transparency, transformation and service excellence direct our behaviour.

People and learners are testimony to the work we do – a spectrum of training courses; disciplines, sectors and locations. A career at the HWSETA provides opportunities to experience the positive impact that our training and development initiatives make.

p.strong: Committed , skilled and inspired people of integrity are at the centre of our delivery model.
